'''Doug Iverson''' is the husband of Shannon Iverson.

==History==
Doug's wife, Shannon, came into the ER after a car accident in which she sustained a head injury. She was 16 weeks pregnant following fertility treatments. She had no signs of brain activity, but the fetal heart rate was strong. Doug had left Shannon a year prior, but Jake tried to track him down so they could consult with him on what to do.

Doug agreed to fly in from London, but they struggled to keep Shannon stable on life support while they waited. When Doug arrived at the hospital, he was informed of the situation. After thinking about the situation, Doug decided to allow them to donate Shannon's organs.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to Shannon Iverson. However, they'd been separated for a year when she was in an accident.

===Familial===
He and his wife used fertility treatments for four years. After Doug left, Shannon continued to try to get pregnant on her own.

==Notes and Trivia==
*Shannon's lungs went to a non-smoking dad who got cancer anyway. Her liver was split between a woman at St. Ambrose and a soldier in Fresno. Her heart went to [[Leanne Schaffer]].
